verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: beto] [ARGM-DIS: o'rourke] [ARG2: a potential presidential candidate] [ARGM-ADV: if beto o'rourke wins a seat in the u s senate this year] one notable member of congress thinks that it would make him a dark horse contender for the white house in a facebook live video while driving around houston together u s rep joe kennedy iii d - massachusetts deflected talk of him running for president by suggesting instead that o'rourke might be the better candidate while they banter was mostly playful kennedy did explain why he thought o'rourke is one of the dark horse contenders houston joseph p kennedy iii beto orourke
